languages.text: И снова стал Судия целостным, и вернулось к нему осмысление мира. Ибо тот, кто мудр, умеет собрать из разбитого целое.
And the Judge became whole again, and regained his comprehension of the world. For one who is wise can make whole what was broken.
languages.original_text: И снова стал Судия целостным, и вернулось к нему осмысление мира. Ибо тот, кто мудр, умеет собрать из разбитого целое.

traits.locale_text: And the Judge was whole again, and regained his comprehension of the world. For one who is wise can make whole what was broken.

And the Judge became whole again, and regained his comprehension of the world. For one who is wise can make whole what was broken.

languages.text: Und der Richter wurde wieder ganz und gewann sein Verständnis der Welt zurück. Denn wer weise ist, kann wieder ganz machen, was kaputtgegangen war.
languages.original_text: And the Judge became whole again, and regained his comprehension of the world. For one who is wise can make whole what was broken.

traits.locale_text: Und der Richter wurde wieder ganz und gewann sein Verständnis der Welt zurück. Denn wer weise ist, kann wieder ganz machen, was kaputtgegangen war.

languages.text: Y el Juez quedó recompuesto y recuperó su comprensión del mundo. Pues los sabios pueden reparar aquello que está roto.
languages.original_text: And the Judge became whole again, and regained his comprehension of the world. For one who is wise can make whole what was broken.

traits.locale_text: Y el Juez quedó recompuesto y recuperó su comprensión del mundo. Pues los sabios pueden reparar aquello que está roto.

languages.text: そしてジャッジは再び完全な姿になり、世界に対する理解を取り戻した。賢き者は、壊れたものを完全にすることができるのだから。
languages.original_text: And the Judge became whole again, and regained his comprehension of the world. For one who is wise can make whole what was broken.

traits.locale_text: そしてジャッジは再び完全な姿になり、世界に対する理解を取り戻した。賢き者は、壊れたものを完全にすることができるのだから。

languages.text: 仲裁者再次变回了完整的样子，重新理解了这个世界。贤明之人可以让一度破碎的东西恢复原状。
languages.original_text: And the Judge became whole again, and regained his comprehension of the world. For one who is wise can make whole what was broken.

traits.locale_text: 仲裁者再次变回了完整的样子，重新理解了这个世界。贤明之人可以让一度破碎的东西恢复原状。

languages.text: Le Juge redevint entier et retrouva sa compréhension du monde. Car le sage peut réparer ce qui a été brisé.
languages.original_text: And the Judge became whole again, and regained his comprehension of the world. For one who is wise can make whole what was broken.

traits.locale_text: Le Juge redevint entier et retrouva sa compréhension du monde. Car le sage peut réparer ce qui a été brisé.

languages.text: Sonrasında Yargıç, tekrar bütün olup dünyayı idrak etme yetisini yeniden kazandı. Çünkü bilge bir kişi, parçalarına ayrılan bir şeyi tekrar bir bütün kılabilir.
languages.original_text: And the Judge became whole again, and regained his comprehension of the world. For one who is wise can make whole what was broken.
